{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":49211,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは目を覚ますと、妙な違和感に首を傾げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance woke up, he tilted his head at a strange discomfort."},{"lineNumber":49212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……朝っぽくないな……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow... it doesn't feel like morning...?\""},{"lineNumber":49213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……これ、は……おわっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... this is... whoa!?\""},{"lineNumber":49214,"originalJapaneseLine":"外は、真っ暗だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside, it was pitch dark."},{"lineNumber":49215,"originalJapaneseLine":"どう見ても夜だというのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"No matter how you looked at it, it was clearly night,"},{"lineNumber":49216,"originalJapaneseLine":"使用人をはじめ、城内を行き来する人は","translatedEnglishLine":"but the people coming and going inside the castle, including the servants,"},{"lineNumber":49217,"originalJapaneseLine":"普通に活動している。","translatedEnglishLine":"were going about their activities as usual."},{"lineNumber":49218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時計は…………むう、朝だな…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The clock... hmm, it's morning...\""},

{"lineNumber":49219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、おはようございます、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, good morning, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":49220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。なんだこれは……なんか、落ち着かんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. What is this... somehow, I feel unsettled.\""},{"lineNumber":49221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「光蝕-ｺｳｼｮｸ-ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's called 'Koushoku' - the Sun's Eclipse.\""},{"lineNumber":49222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、今日だったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, so it's today.\""},{"lineNumber":49223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーーーーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":49224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはよ、おとーさん、シィルおねーちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Dad, Shiiru big sis!\""},{"lineNumber":49225,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットはぺこりとお辞儀で挨拶した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset greeted with a polite bow."},{"lineNumber":49226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはよう、リセットちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Reset-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":49227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、ね！　ね！　お外！　真っ暗！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, hey! Hey! Outside! Pitch dark!"},{"lineNumber":49228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜だよ！　朝なのに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's night! Even though it's morning!\""},{"lineNumber":49229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは光蝕と言って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is called 'Koushoku',"},{"lineNumber":49230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　朝なのに真っ暗なままの日なんですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"a day that's pitch dark even though it's morning.\""},{"lineNumber":49231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっとこのままなの……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Will it stay like this all day...?\""},{"lineNumber":49232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ、昼には元に戻りますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it will return to normal by noon.\""},{"lineNumber":49233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほ。よかったー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. That's a relief.\""},{"lineNumber":49234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはようございます、総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Supreme Commander.\""},{"lineNumber":49235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ウルザちゃんか、おはよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Ulza-chan, good morning."},{"lineNumber":49236,"originalJapaneseLine":"　真っ暗なのにおはようは、なんだか変な感じだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying good morning despite the darkness feels kind of strange.\""},{"lineNumber":49237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's true."},{"lineNumber":49238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな状況ですが……出発はどうしますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Given this situation... what shall we do about departure?\""},{"lineNumber":49239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":49240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これでは、魔軍も動かないと思います。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't think the demon army will move under these conditions."},{"lineNumber":49241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出発を昼過ぎに遅らせてもいい気がしますが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We might delay departure until after noon...\""},{"lineNumber":49242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、逆にチャンスだ。面白いぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, on the contrary, this is a chance. Interesting."},{"lineNumber":49243,"originalJapaneseLine":"　予定通り出発だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll depart as planned.\""},{"lineNumber":49244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統……何か、お考えがあるのですよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander... you do have something in mind, right?\""},{"lineNumber":49245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、大丈夫だ大丈夫。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, it's fine, it's fine."},{"lineNumber":49246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行き先はどこだったっけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where was the destination again?\""},{"lineNumber":49247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This way.\""},{"lineNumber":49248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「北からナガールモール」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From the north, Nagalmol.\""},{"lineNumber":49249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこからやや南東にスリミド」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then slightly southeast to Surimido.\""},{"lineNumber":49250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それからテープにほど近いイタリア」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then near Tape, Italy.\""},{"lineNumber":49251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利のきくさんからの情報によると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"According to information from Kiku of Mouri,"},{"lineNumber":49252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この3箇所のいずれかにツォトンがいると思われます」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tzoton is believed to be at one of these three locations.\""},{"lineNumber":49253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぅむ、3箇所か……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, three places..."},{"lineNumber":49254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこが特別怪しいとか、あるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is any one of them particularly suspicious?\""},{"lineNumber":49255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ。そこまでの情報はありませんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, we don't have information to that extent.\""},{"lineNumber":49256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん。まぁよし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Well, alright."},{"lineNumber":49257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら純然たる勘で……ここだーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then purely by intuition... here it is!\""},{"lineNumber":49258,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、地図に示された一点に指を突きつけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance pointed his finger at a single spot marked on the map."},{"lineNumber":49259,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,"},{"lineNumber":49260,"originalJapaneseLine":"ナガールモールの近辺にやって来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and had come near Nagalmol."},{"lineNumber":49261,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,"},{"lineNumber":49262,"originalJapaneseLine":"スリミドの近辺にやって来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and had come near Surimido."},{"lineNumber":49263,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,"},{"lineNumber":49264,"originalJapaneseLine":"イタリアの近辺にやって来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and had come near Italy."},{"lineNumber":49265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふうむ……本当に暗いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm... it's really dark."},{"lineNumber":49266,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもの夜より暗いんじゃないのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't it darker than a usual night?\""},{"lineNumber":49267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「星の光も、どんどん弱くなってますし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The starlight is also gradually dimming..."},{"lineNumber":49268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不思議ですねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's quite mysterious...\""},{"lineNumber":49269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「注意してください。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please be careful."},{"lineNumber":49270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この辺りは、既に魔軍の支配下です」","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is already under the control of the demon army.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは目を覚ますと、妙な違和感に首を傾げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance woke up, he tilted his head at a strange discomfort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……朝っぽくないな……？」
「ん……これ、は……おわっ！？」
外は、真っ暗だった。
どう見ても夜だというのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how you looked at it, it was clearly night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使用人をはじめ、城内を行き来する人は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the people coming and going inside the castle, including the servants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通に活動している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were going about their activities as usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時計は…………むう、朝だな…………」
「あっ、おはようございます、ランス様」
「おう。なんだこれは……なんか、落ち着かんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. What is this... somehow, I feel unsettled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「光蝕-ｺｳｼｮｸ-ですよ」
「ああ、今日だったか」
「わーーーーーーーっ！」
「おはよ、おとーさん、シィルおねーちゃん！」
リセットはぺこりとお辞儀で挨拶した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset greeted with a polite bow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おはよう、リセットちゃん」
「で、ね！　ね！　お外！　真っ暗！
夜だよ！　朝なのに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's night! Even though it's morning!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは光蝕と言って、
朝なのに真っ暗なままの日なんですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a day that's pitch dark even though it's morning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずっとこのままなの……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Will it stay like this all day...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ、昼には元に戻りますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it will return to normal by noon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほ。よかったー」
「おはようございます、総統」
「お、ウルザちゃんか、おはよう。
真っ暗なのにおはようは、なんだか変な感じだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying good morning despite the darkness feels kind of strange."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね。
こんな状況ですが……出発はどうしますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Given this situation... what shall we do about departure?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでは、魔軍も動かないと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think the demon army will move under these conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発を昼過ぎに遅らせてもいい気がしますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might delay departure until after noon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、逆にチャンスだ。面白いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, on the contrary, this is a chance. Interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定通り出発だ」
「総統……何か、お考えがあるのですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander... you do have something in mind, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、大丈夫だ大丈夫。
行き先はどこだったっけ」
「こちらです」
「北からナガールモール」
「そこからやや南東にスリミド」
「それからテープにほど近いイタリア」
「毛利のきくさんからの情報によると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to information from Kiku of Mouri,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この3箇所のいずれかにツォトンがいると思われます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tzoton is believed to be at one of these three locations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅむ、3箇所か……
どこが特別怪しいとか、あるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is any one of them particularly suspicious?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。そこまでの情報はありませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we don't have information to that extent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん。まぁよし。
なら純然たる勘で……ここだーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then purely by intuition... here it is!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、地図に示された一点に指を突きつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance pointed his finger at a single spot marked on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナガールモールの近辺にやって来ていた。
ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミドの近辺にやって来ていた。
ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリアの近辺にやって来ていた。
「ふうむ……本当に暗いな。
いつもの夜より暗いんじゃないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it darker than a usual night?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「星の光も、どんどん弱くなってますし……
不思議ですねぇ……」
「注意してください。
この辺りは、既に魔軍の支配下です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is already under the control of the demon army."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

どう見ても夜だというのに、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think the demon army will move under these conditions.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might delay departure until after noon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、逆にチャンスだ。面白いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, on the contrary, this is a chance. Interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定通り出発だ」
「総統……何か、お考えがあるのですよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander... you do have something in mind, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、大丈夫だ大丈夫。
行き先はどこだったっけ」
「こちらです」
「北からナガールモール」
「そこからやや南東にスリミド」
「それからテープにほど近いイタリア」
「毛利のきくさんからの情報によると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to information from Kiku of Mouri,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この3箇所のいずれかにツォトンがいると思われます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tzoton is believed to be at one of these three locations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅむ、3箇所か……
どこが特別怪しいとか、あるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is any one of them particularly suspicious?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。そこまでの情報はありませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we don't have information to that extent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん。まぁよし。
なら純然たる勘で……ここだーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then purely by intuition... here it is!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、地図に示された一点に指を突きつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance pointed his finger at a single spot marked on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナガールモールの近辺にやって来ていた。
ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミドの近辺にやって来ていた。
ランス達は、魔物大将軍ツォトンを探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group searched for the Demon General Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリアの近辺にやって来ていた。
「ふうむ……本当に暗いな。
いつもの夜より暗いんじゃないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it darker than a usual night?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「星の光も、どんどん弱くなってますし……
不思議ですねぇ……」
「注意してください。
この辺りは、既に魔軍の支配下です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is already under the control of the demon army."
